channel.title: CVE Feed for GE HealthCare -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE HealthCare -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-14004|2024-09-16T17:27:58.161Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20gemnet%20license%20server%20aka.%20%28echoserver%29
item.description: GE GEMNet License server (EchoServer) all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2017-14008|2024-09-16T17:43:31.891Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20centricity%20pacs%20ra1000
item.description: GE Centricity PACS RA1000, diagnostic image analysis, all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-1486|2024-08-16T18:15:02.675Z -- ge%20healthcare -- venue
item.description: Elevation of privileges via misconfigured access control list in GE HealthCare ultrasound devices

item.title: CVE-2024-1629|2024-08-01T18:48:21.479Z -- ge%20healthcare -- venue
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in “deleteFiles” function of Common Service Desktop, a GE HealthCare ultrasound device component

item.title: CVE-2024-1486|2024-08-01T18:40:21.121Z -- ge%20healthcare -- venue

item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in “getAllFolderContents” function of Common Service Desktop, a GE HealthCare ultrasound device component
